Drumsna | Connaught | County Leitrim | Dublin | Sligo

In the autumn, 184â€”, business took me into the West of Ireland, and, amongst other places, to the quiet little village of Drumsna, which is in the province of Connaught, County Leitrim, about 72 miles W.N.W. of Dublin, on the mail-coach road to Sligo.
